title: Move to new Snapshot voting page
body:
Proposed by [@monet-supply](https://twitter.com/MonetSupply)

### Background

The current snapshot page doesn't support voting with PASTA supplied to LP tokens. It's also not upgradable, which limits the ability to create new voting strategies going forward.

### Proposal

Transition all new proposals and PASTA voting to the pasta.eth snapshot space here: [https://snapshot.org/#/pasta.eth](https://snapshot.org/#/pasta.eth)

The new Snapshot space uses a voting strategy which counts total PASTA owned in the wallet and supplied to Uniswap. This allows a wider group of potential users to participate in governance. 

The space can also be upgraded/updated via the controller of the pasta.eth domain (currently monetsupply for convenience but this can be transitioned to DAO ownership in the future). This allows the DAO to upgrade its voting mechanisms in the future without additional migrations.

### Proposal Question

Should the DAO move all future Snapshot polls and proposals to the pasta.eth space hosted [here](https://snapshot.org/#/pasta.eth)?
author: 0x8d07D225a769b7Af3A923481E1FdF49180e6A265
